sentence.Network_en: Newark, New Jersey. The name had a ring of hope to it.
sentence.Network_cn: 新泽西州的纽瓦克, 这地名似乎佩上了希望的光环.

sentence.Network_en: In many ways, Newark has never really recovered from the 1967 riots.
sentence.Network_cn: 纽瓦克在许多方面都未从1967年的动乱中恢复元气.

sentence.Network_en: He's been committed to a private psychiatric hospital in Newark.
sentence.Network_cn: 他已被收进纽瓦克的一家私立精神病院.
